title: Head of Technology Department
description: Technology Department which I was responsible for, consisted of over 50 professionals specialized in various areas. The vast majority of them were software developers (Java, .Net, C++, Ruby, JavaScript). However, there were also other professions such as Quality Engineers, UX and Graphic Designers. Products developed within the department were also differentiated and covered among others: web applications, embedded systems and games. My job, as the Head of the Department, was to make sure that despite such variety, all teams are working efficiently and following best engineering practices.

details.title: See key responsibilities
items: Contribute to the overall technology strategy of the company
Leading, mentoring and growing engineering teams
Establishing and maintaining solid software engineering practices (e.g. Continuous Delivery, Lean Software Development)
Ensuring highest quality of developed software
Managing internal R&D projects (e.g. Game Framework Development)
